Name: Enhanced Exceed
Desc: Permanently add more attacks at a certain rate after Exceed Attack.

H.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] Adds extra attack to 2 enemies 2 times with a chance of 70% and damage of 200% after permanent Exceed attack.
H.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] Permanently makes Exceed create a 70% chance of attacking up to 2 enemies at 200% Damage 2 times on hit.

h1.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] Adds extra attack to 2 enemies 2 times with a chance of 70% and damage of 200% after permanent Exceed attack.
h1.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] Permanently makes Exceed create a 70% chance of attacking up to 2 enemies at 200% Damage 2 times on hit.
